course_description: This course accompanies a graduate teaching assistant's work in the intro electricity and magnetism labs.  Various physics education research ideas, results, and articles are examined in addition to preparation for weekly teaching duties.
schedule_location: W 8:30am-11:15am in Math & Science Center - W202
